name: Collage (CollageGame)
description:
Collage is a multiplayer 3D environment inspired by the Sokpop collective’s game Sok-worlds. In Collage, you can use over 1.9 million images in the Pixabay API to create interesting 3D collages, and share them with friends.

After playing Sok-worlds, I wanted to experience the best part of the game (building the worlds) with my friends, but there was no multiplayer functionality. So, I took it upon myself to recreate the game and integrate the feature of online and local multiplayer rooms.

Here is a guide on setting up an online room without the need to port-forward.
